Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ipqw gurU qoˆ gurU puqR pRgitAw:

lines.gurmukhi: Awid AMiq ibsmwd Pl dRum gur isK sMD giq [

Unknown.translation: Just as the puzzle of seed and tree as to who came first is strange and perplexing, similarly strange is understanding the meeting of Guru and Sikh.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Awid = gurU mhwrwj jI sRI Amr dyv sihb dIAwˆ crx kmlwˆ ivc Awaux qoˆ pihlwˆ AQvw Avqwr lYx qoˆ pRQm BI, jo ibsmwd Ascrj srUp sn, Aqy ibsmwd rUp hI sRI gurU mhwrwj jI dy pwr ibMd ivKy pRwpq hox AnMqr AQvw mwnuKI nr nwt smwpq kr ky dUsry srUp ivc joq jgwvn dy smX AMq nUM BI sn, AYsy sRI gurU rwm dws jI ny Pl Aru ibrC vwlI dSw cwl Anuswr gur isK sMDI gurU Aru isK dy myly imln, dI imrXwdw BI ibsmwd rUp hI vrqweI[

lines.gurmukhi: Awid prm prmwid AMq AnMq n jwnIAY [1[6[

Unknown.translation: This mystery of the beginning and end is beyond comprehension. Lord is beyond, away and infinite.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Awid prm = ijnwˆ qoˆ pry AwdO rUp koeI nhIˆ ArQwq sB dI Awid dy jo Awid hn, qy Awid AMq qoˆ pry hn nhIˆ jwixAw jw skdw Enwˆ dw mrm ivSyS qrHwˆ nwl ikauˆik auh AnMq rUp hn = dyS kwl vsqU pirCyd qoˆ pry ]16]
ieh ApUrb cwl gurU rwmdws jI qorI

lines.gurmukhi: Pl dRum gurisK sMD giq Awid AMq ibsmwid [

Unknown.translation: Guru Ram Das caused the meeting of Guru and Sikh in the same wondrous way of fruit and tree.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Plu Aru ibrC dy ckRwkwr cwly vq ijnHwˆ ny, gurU isK imlwp dI rIqI nUM Awid AMq ivKy hI, ibsmwd rUp vrqwieAw[

lines.gurmukhi: AMq AnMq n jwnIAY Awd prm prmwid [2[6[

Unknown.translation: That perspective is infinite and no one can understand it. It is beyond, away and still away out of the reach of mortals.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Enwˆ AnMq rUp sRI gurU rwmdws jI dw AMq EVk nhIˆ jwixAwˆ jw skdw, auh ibsmwd rUp sB dI prw kwStw prm h`d Awid hn[ Bwv Enwˆ dI Awid koeI nhIˆ ]17]
sRI gurU Arjndyv iks pkwr gurU bxy:

lines.gurmukhi: Awid prm prmwid nwd imil nwd sbd Duin [

Unknown.translation: Just as the sound of musical instruments melds with the words (of song/hymns), similarly Guru Ram Das and Guru Arjan became indistinguishable.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: smUh jV jMgm rUp vwn isRStI rcnw ivKy prm auqikRSt rUp Bwv sB qoˆ auqm sB dw pRQm BwvI Awid jo jIvwqmw hY, so prmwid sMpUrx Awdwˆ dy Awid = prm bRhm prmwqmw ivKy smwie AByd ho auhI srUp bx jwˆdw hY; ijs pRkwrnwd iml ky nwd ivKy ijs pRkwr Sbd dI DunI rUp ho jwieAw krdw hY,

lines.gurmukhi: sillih sill smwie nwd srqw swgr suin [

Unknown.translation: Just as the river water becomes inseparable from the water of the ocean, Guru Arjan became one with Guru Amar Das by engrossing himself in his precepts and following them obediently.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ndI dw pwxI nwd grjnw krdw hoieAw smuMdR dy ins qrMg jl ivKy smw AByd ho ky Swˆq rUp ho jwieAw krdw hY,

lines.gurmukhi: nrpiq suq inRp hoq joiq gurmuiK gun gur jn [

Unknown.translation: Just as son of a king becomes king, similarly Guru Arjan born as son to Guru Ram Das became an enlightened soul by singing the eulogies of Lord-a boon blessed to him by Satguru.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: rwjy dy puqR dy rwjw hox vq gurmuK gurU kw isK guxwnuvwd gwXn krqw nwm jpdw hoieAw joq rUp hI ho jwieAw krdw hY,

lines.gurmukhi: rwm nwm prswid Bey gur qy guru Arjn [3[6[

Unknown.translation: By the grace of Guru Ram Das, Arjan Dev succeeded him as Guru Arjan Dev.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iesI pRkwr rwm hY nwm ijnwˆ dw, AYsy sRI gurU rwm dws jI dI ikpw kr ky sRI Arjn dyv jI gurU bx gey ]18]
